answers.question: Assessable profits
answers.justification: Net profit is calculated by summing all income and expense amounts. Total income: -16672852.18 (Loan interest income) - 42523.7 (Hong Kong bank interest income) - 1.0 (Sundry income) = -16715376.88. Total expenses: 54931.21 (Auditor's remuneration) + 9520.0 (Bank charges) + 15440.0 (Building management fee) + ... + 668085.0 (Tax expense) = 4906188.2. Net profit = -16715376.88 + 4906188.2 = -11809188.68.
